name: Let There Be Chaos With Traffic
name_original: Let There Be Chaos With Traffic
description:
Controls

Your Score/Barriers  are displayed in the top left. left click to place barriers, you can only place them after 10 seconds. If any Red cars get through you lose. Every time you place a barrier you lose a point and every time you make a red car crash you gain a point. Red cars will start spawning after a while. 

BACKSTORY

You're the friend of the person in the blue car. The red cars are the police and you have to stop them from getting to your friend.

Other

The highway maps are the most interesting.

Play in fullscreen to get the ui.
